title: Optimizing Mathematics Project-Based Learning Through CSCL (Computer-Supported Collaborative Learning) Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Mathematical Concepts and Proficiency in Collaborative Tools
context.additional_context: Collaborative project solving complex mathematical problems in digital environments, integrating cognitive load management strategies

learning_goals: Learners apply strategies to reduce cognitive load by 20% or more when designing math projects in CSCL (Computer-Supported Collaborative Learning) environments
Learners achieve over 80% completion rates in solving complex math problems through collaborative tools (digital whiteboards, shared documents)
Learners manage errors during project design to fewer than three occurrences and establish efficient workflows
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
